title: MoviePass is back, better, and maybe more confusing than before
description: MoviePass now works as a credit system where the cost of watching a movie depends on the day, time, and location.

title: Up to 1.5 million WordPress sites could be hit by this security flaw - so patch up now
description: A popular WordPress plugin could have been exposing thousands of websites to potential takeover attacks.

title: Barracuda warns users about possible email compromise attacks - here's what you need to know
description: A number of firms were warned by Barracuda about a possible breach, but we don’t know how many, or who attacked them.

title: GitLab releases emergency security patch, tells users to update immediately
description: GitLab 10/10 vulnerability was recently discovered and with no workaround available, the patch is the only solution.

title: Microsoft is finally introducing the feature that’ll make me upgrade to Windows 11
description: Never combine is here! In testing, anyway, so hopefully the taskbar will be a more welcoming place with the 23H2 update.

title: Canva thinks you're doing data visualization wrong
description: Canva announces more support for data visualizations following Flourish acquisition, as it sets its design-eye on Europe.

title: Windows 11 gets a nifty tweak to kill frozen apps, catching up with macOS
description: Apple has allowed users to swiftly force close unresponsive apps for ages, so it’s about time Microsoft sorted this out.

title: This free VPN leaked data from millions of users online - find out if you're affected
description: SuperVPN breach "serves as a wake-up call" for the need to choose a trustworthy VPN provider, experts say - here's all you need to know.

title: Android's Contacts app could get a version of Snapchat’s worst feature
description: Android's Contacts is getting Google Maps support, so you can always know where your friends are, and even what the weather's like for them.

title: Every announcement at Sony's PlayStation Showcase
description: The latest PlayStation Showcase was packed with titles. We've put them all in one place for your convenience.

title: Keeper can now automatically change up your passwords
description: Keeper's new Password Rotation feature ensures your credentials for popular enterprise services remain fresh.

title: Bitwarden adds passkey support to give you one less thing to worry about
description: After being teased for a while, top free password manager finally supports the passwordless future.

title: 5 macOS Ventura features that will supercharge your productivity
description: Upgrade to macOS Ventura now so you can take advantage of these new features that will improve your productivity and streamline your workflow.

title: Data breach at US debt collector exposes over a million users
description: After exposing sensitive user information, NCB offered two years of identity theft monitoring services, free of charge.

title: OLED TV prices are set to fall a lot, but maybe not this year
description: Good news for anyone holding out on an OLED TV purchase – the premium panel technology looks set to get significantly cheaper, probably starting in 2024.

title: The latest iPhone 15 charging rumor sounds very un-Apple
description: Apple may be preparing to lift restrictions on third-party wireless chargers with the iPhone 15.

title: 16K displays are already here to bring future Nvidia and AMD GPUs to their knees
description: Chinese display giant has a 110-inch prototype monitor on show as market waits for more 8K screens.

title: New Max streaming service angers writers and directors with big crediting error
description: Warner Bros. Discovery issues an apology after failing to properly credit writers and directors on its new Max streaming service.

title: You'll soon be able to create all kinds of documents in Google Docs - here's how
description: Google Docs can make you invoices, contracts and more with just a few clicks.

title: The Leica Q3 is here – and it’s definitely the Leica I’d buy if I was rich
description: With a 60.3MP sensor, 8K video and 28mm f/1.7 full-frame lens, the third generation of Leica’s fixed-lens full-frame digital rangefinder is the most compelling Leica to date.

title: Sony's Project Q is a handheld without the portability
description: Sony revealed its Project Q handheld during the PlayStation Showcase, a device that’ll likely have limited appeal.

title: Every PSVR 2 game announced at the PlayStation Showcase
description: Missed the PlayStation Showcase? Here’s every PSVR 2 game announcement from the live event.

title: A major OnePlus 12 specs leak suggests the cameras could be getting a big upgrade
description: A big OnePlus 12 leak has revealed most of the possible specs and points to an early release date.

title: The Mother is still Netflix's top movie, but a new thriller at number 6 is the one to watch
description: Missing is a knockout thriller you’ll definitely want to watch – and it’s currently number six in Netflix’s Top 10 movies.

title: The new Nreal Air AR smart glasses’ ‘brain’ could solve the gadget’s biggest problems
description: The Nreal Air AR glasses are about to get smarter thanks to the Xreal Beam add-on that's arriving later this year.

title: Sony’s PS5 wireless earbuds want to be your best gaming buds, but I’m not so sure
description: Sony’s PS5 earbuds look pretty, but I need more info – including whether I'll have to sacrifice audio quality for low lag – before I get excited.

title: Having trouble copying and saving files across Windows? This could be why
description: Saving and copying files across multiple Windows versions is causing issues, Microsoft confirms.

title: Leaks suggest iOS 17 could make your iPhone way more useful in the home
description: Apple is working on improving its smart home lineup and may have iPhones play a bigger role in the future.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Thursday, May 25 (game #486)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: MGS3 is being remade as Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
description: The cold-war set stealth game is being remade with a fancy new title

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 reveal adds Kraven the Hunter, symbiotes
description: It's all change as the hype-train leaves the station for Marvel's Spider-Man 2
